nodes.description: 1995年4月19日，俄克拉荷马联邦大楼遭恐怖袭击爆炸，促使总统要求司法部启动安全评估
nodes.support_text: prepared at the direction of the President after the April 19 bombing of the Oklahoma City federal building.

nodes.description: 1995年6月28日，司法部发布联邦建筑安全升级报告，提出52项新安全标准
nodes.support_text: The study proposes new minimum security standards for federal buildings, and recommends that each federal facility be upgraded to meet those standards to the extent feasible.

nodes.description: 调查显示联邦建筑普遍存在安全漏洞，多数建筑因历史设计未考虑恐怖袭击风险
nodes.support_text: the survey concluded that typical federal facilities lack some of the elements needed to meet the new minimum security standards, recommended in light of the changed environment of heightened risk.

nodes.description: 报告统计显示，1995年6月28日前两个月内200个联邦建筑收到炸弹威胁
nodes.support_text: in the last two months alone, 200 federal buildings have received bomb threats.

nodes.description: 将联邦建筑划分为5个安全等级（Level 1-5），俄克拉荷马大楼为Level 4
nodes.support_text: Federal sites were divided into five security levels ranging from a Level 1... to a Level 5...

nodes.description: 针对Level 4以上建筑提出具体升级要求，包括监控系统、防弹玻璃等
nodes.support_text: the report calls for such things as controls over facility parking, perimeter monitoring by closed-circuit television, intrusion-detection systems...

nodes.description: 建议由GSA负责实施安全升级，并升级联邦保护服务
nodes.support_text: the report also recommends reemphasizing the General Servie Administration's primary responsibility for implementing federal facility security, upgrading of the Federal Protective Service...

nodes.description: 估算Level 4新建建筑安全升级成本约250万美元（占3.3%），改造成本最高达300万美元
nodes.support_text: the report estimates that the minimum security features recommended for a typical Level 4 building would add about $2.5 million to the cost of new construction...

nodes.description: 要求建立建筑级安全委员会和跨部门Interagency Security Committee
nodes.support_text: the report recommended that security issues first be addressed by building-level security committees...

nodes.description: 约100万联邦文职员工在政府通用服务管理局租赁或拥有的空间工作
nodes.support_text: 约100万联邦文职员工在政府通用服务管理局租赁或拥有的空间工作

nodes.description: 在为期两个月的审查中包含这些地点

nodes.description: 报告建议安全委员会优先处理安全问题
nodes.support_text: the report recommends that security issues first be addressed by building-level security committees...
